messageBody:
> I am new to Junit. I have just started getting to know Junit. Can any one
> tell me how to launch Junit?


short answer: java junit.textui.TestRunner myClass

long answer: READ THE DO-CU-MEN-TA-TION THAT COMES WITH JUNIT !!

ok I promise, next time I'll simply ignore mails like yours.


-Vladimir
